content: the brim is not desired colour-work switch to 3 25mm needles to knit 3 row in main colour at the last row place stitch markers every 26 stitches to keep track of colour-work chart if desired switch to 3 50mm needles to knit the colour-work chart pattern the chart will repeat 4 5 6 times horizontally for each respective size for row with only main colour switch to 3 25mm needles to keep gauge consistent after the colour-work chart is completed break main colour yarn leaving enough to weave in later switch to 3 25mm needles and continue knitting in contrast colour until work measures 6 6 5 7 inches or 15 25 16 5 17 75 cm from where the colour-work began decreases size large only round 1 *k10 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 2 *k9 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor size medium and size large only round 1 *k8 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 2 *k7 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor all sizes round 1 *k6 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 2 *k5 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 3 *k4 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 4 *k3 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 5 *k2 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 6 *k1 k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor round 7 *k2tog* repeat from * to * until eor break yarn leaving a 6-inch 15cm tail thread the tail through a tapestry needle and pass through all remaining stitches and tighten weave in the end on the wrong side of the fabric weave in all other ends optional make a pompom in the contrast colour and attach to the top of the hat block work if desired
